column2: CHAPTER 8
column3: CHAPTER eight

column2: GREETINGS
column3: GREETINGS

column2: This is all? Jack said.
column3: This is all? Jack said.

column2: The message stared up at them cryptically.
column3: The message stared up at them cryptically.

column2: Can you hear me?
column3: Can you hear me?

column2: Then a voice came whispering through the static.
column3: Then a voice came whispering through the static.

column2: We need your co-ordinates in order to tell, Tiger said.
column3: We need your co ordinates in order to tell, Tiger said.

column2: Who are you?
column3: Who are you?

column2: Check these out fast, he told Jack.
column3: Check these out fast, he told Jack.

column2: We are all dying, but if you must have a contract to come...."
column3: We are all dying, but if you must have a contract to come...."

column2: We're coming.	We're coming.
A planet calling for help, with no Hospital Earth contract!"
column3: A planet calling for help, with no Hospital Earth contract!"

column2: They sound desperate, Dal said.
column3: They sound desperate, Dal said.

column2: Tiger was right; this was almost too good to be true.
column3: Tiger was right; this was almost too good to be true.

column2: Says it's an Earth-type planet, and not much else.
column3: Says it's an Earth type planet, and not much else.

column2: Gives reference to the full report in the Confederation files.
column3: Gives reference to the full report in the Confederation files.

column2: Contract! Jack said.
column3: Contract! Jack said.

column2: It doesn't even say there are any people there. Not a word about any kind of life form.
column3: It doesn't even say there are any people there. Not a word about any kind of life form.

column2: Jack stared at him.
column3: Jack stared at him.

column2: We can't do that, they'd skin us alive.
column3: We can't do that, they'd skin us alive.

column2: Tiger got the request off while Jack and Dal strapped down for the conversion to Koenig drive.
column3: Tiger got the request off while Jack and Dal strapped down for the conversion to Koenig drive.
